question.body: Which endocrine gland receives hormonal signals secreted by the hypothalamus and transported via the hypophyseal portal vein?

response.feedback: Incorrect. While part of the brain, it is not directly regulated by the hypothalamus.
Correct. The hypophyseal vein connects capillaries of the hypothalamus to the capillaries of the adenohypohysis (anterior pituitary) .
Incorrect. The hypothalamus neurosecretory cell axons extend directly into this gland.
Incorect. This gland is not part of the brain or hypophyseal complex.

part.hint: This looks like one gland but has two structurally and functionally distinct tissues internally.
